collection_management.title: Collection Management
collection_management.note: Note: Appwrite TablesDB API doesn't support programmatic collection management. Collections must be managed via the Appwrite Console.
collection_management.manage_in_console_description: Create, edit, and delete collections using the Appwrite Console interface
collection_management.create_collection_description: Use Appwrite Console to create new collections with custom attributes and indexes
collection_management.edit_collection_description: Modify collection attributes, indexes, and permissions in Appwrite Console

query_builder.title: Query Builder
query_builder.description: Build and execute database queries visually
query_builder.no_filters: No filters added. Click 'Add Filter' to start.

backup_schedule.title: Backup Scheduling
backup_schedule.note: Note: Schedule changes require server restart to take effect. Configuration is managed via environment variables.

index_management.title: Index Management
index_management.description: Manage database indexes for optimal query performance
index_management.note: Note: Appwrite TablesDB API doesn't support programmatic index management. Indexes must be managed via the Appwrite Console.
index_management.manage_in_console_description: Create, edit, and delete indexes using the Appwrite Console interface
index_management.key_index_description: Standard index for faster queries on specific fields
index_management.unique_index_description: Ensures field values are unique across documents
index_management.fulltext_index_description: Enables full-text search capabilities on text fields
index_management.practice_1: Create indexes on frequently queried fields
index_management.practice_2: Use unique indexes for fields that must be unique (e.g., email, slug)
index_management.practice_3: Avoid over-indexing as it can slow down write operations
index_management.practice_4: Monitor query performance and adjust indexes accordingly

monitoring.title: Query Monitoring
monitoring.description: Monitor database query performance, track slow queries, and view optimization suggestions
monitoring.slow_queries_list_description: Queries that took longer than 1 second to execute
monitoring.no_queries_description: Query metrics will appear here as you execute queries
